name: Rejuvenate Eidolon, Lesser
components: V, S, M (a drop of your blood)
text: By laying your hand upon an eidolon, you cause its wounds to close and its form to solidify. This spell cures 1d10 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +5).
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (一滴你的血液)
text_zh: 通过用手触摸一个精神向导，你会使它的伤口愈合并巩固它的形态。该法术能够治疗1d10+每施法者等级1点伤害 (最高+5)。
